LanguageData.FTC_Bunker_Turret.label: Quad machine gun bunker
LanguageData.FTC_Bunker_Turret.description: An entrenched, manned stationary machinegun bunker. Gunners can safely man the gun inside this permanent fortification. \n\n This is a permanent structure, place it wisely.
LanguageData.FTC_Bunker_Gun.label: Quad machine gun
LanguageData.FTC_Bunker_Gun.description: Four machine guns mounted inside a bunker.
LanguageData.FTC_AntiTank_Turret.label: Tank bunker
LanguageData.FTC_AntiTank_Turret.description:
A stationary tank turret mounted on an entrenched concrete box. n
 Gunners can safely man this bunker fortification until it is destroyed.

 This is a permanent structure, place it wisely.
LanguageData.FTC_AntiTank_Gun.label: Anti tank cannon turret
LanguageData.FTC_AntiTank_Gun.description: An anti tank cannon mounted on an armoured turret.
LanguageData.FTC_Batterey_Turret.label: Coastal battery
LanguageData.FTC_Batterey_Turret.description:
A heavy navy gun mounted on a large concrete bunker. Can effectively destroy enemies within range. n
 Gunners can safely man this permanent fortification until it is destroyed. 

 This is a permanent structure, place it wisely.
LanguageData.FTC_Batterey_Gun.label: Coastal artillery
LanguageData.FTC_Batterey_Gun.description: A navy gun turret. Two operators are required to man this gun.
LanguageData.FT_Bullet_BatteryShell.label: Heavy explosive shell
